extendedInfo.description: Oil painting is the process of painting with pigments that are bound with a medium of drying oilâespecially in early modern Europe, linseed oil. They produce a distinct set of color that is love by many around the world. If you like oil painting you will love this amazing 3D Cube Live Wallpaper. It mixed the old brilliant color of oil painting and modern 3D technique of lighting and particle effect into one stunning live wallpaper on your android phone. Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
